mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NUMBER ,M.MEMBER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(M.MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH FROM DT_CHAT_SESSION CS JOIN DT_MEMBER M ON CS.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER WHERE CS.DOCTOR_NUMBER = #{doctorNumber}
SELECT MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR(MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH FROM DT_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}

SELECT D.DOCTOR_NAME , H.HOSPITAL_NAME , M.MEMBER_NAME , TO_CHAR(M.MEMBER_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEMBER_BIRTH FROM DT_CHAT_SESSION CS JOIN DT_DOCTOR D ON CS.DOCTOR_NUMBER = D.DOCTOR_NUMBER JOIN DT_MEMBER M ON CS.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN DT_HOSPITAL H ON H.HOSPITAL_NUMBER = D.HOSPITAL_NUMBER WHERE M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} AND D.DOCTOR_NUMBER = #{doctorNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_CHART (CHART_NUMBER, CHART_NAME, CHART_MEDICINE, CHART_DAY, CHART_TIME, CHART_PERIOD, MEMBER_NUMBER, DOCTOR_NUMBER, CHART_WRITE_DATE) VALUES (CHART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chartName}, #{chartMedicine}, #{chartDay}, #{chartTime}, #{chartPeriod}, #{memberNumber}, #{doctorNumber}, SYSDATE);
